props.name: columns

accessor.name: string
accessor.description: String used to access the correct cell data for this column

props.docblock: Definition of table columns

description.text: Definition of table columns

props.name: data
props.docblock: Data to be displayed in the table

description.text: Data to be displayed in the table

props.name: isSelectable
props.docblock: table rows can be selected

description.text: table rows can be selected

props.name: isSortable
props.docblock: Table columns can be sorted

description.text: Table columns can be sorted

props.name: manualSortBy
props.docblock: Indicates that sorting will be done via backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

description.text: Indicates that sorting will be done via backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

props.name: isPaginated
props.docblock: Paginate the table

description.text: Paginate the table

props.name: isFilterable
props.docblock: Table rows can be filtered, using a default filter in the default column values, or in the column definition

description.text: Table rows can be filtered, using a default filter in the default column values, or in the column definition

props.name: manualFilters
props.docblock: Indicates that filtering will be done via a backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

description.text: Indicates that filtering will be done via a backend API. A fetchData function must be provided

props.name: defaultColumnValues

Filter.name: union
Filter.description: A default filter component for the column

props.docblock: defaults that will be set on each column. Will be overridden by individual column values

description.text: defaults that will be set on each column. Will be overridden by individual column values

props.name: additionalColumns

id.name: string
id.description: id must be unique from other columns ids

Header.name: union
Header.description: column header that will be displayed to the user

Cell.name: union
Cell.description: Component that renders in the added column. It will receive the row as a prop

props.docblock: Actions or other additional non-data columns can be added here

description.text: Actions or other additional non-data columns can be added here

props.name: fetchData
props.docblock:
Function that will fetch table data. Called when page size, page index or filters change.
Meant to be used with manual filters and pagination

description.text:
Function that will fetch table data. Called when page size, page index or filters change.
Meant to be used with manual filters and pagination

props.name: initialState
props.docblock: Initial state passed to react-table's documentation https://react-table.tanstack.com/docs/api/useTable

description.text: Initial state passed to react-table's documentation https://react-table.tanstack.com/docs/api/useTable

props.name: initialTableOptions
props.docblock:
Table options passed to react-table's useTable hook. Will override some options passed in to DataTable, such
     as: data, columns, defaultColumn, manualFilters, manualPagination, manualSortBy, and initialState

description.text:
Table options passed to react-table's useTable hook. Will override some options passed in to DataTable, such
     as: data, columns, defaultColumn, manualFilters, manualPagination, manualSortBy, and initialState

props.name: itemCount
props.docblock: Total number of items

description.text: Total number of items

props.name: bulkActions

handleClick.name: func
handleClick.description: handleClick will be passed the selected rows

variant.name: string
variant.description: optional button variant; only relevant for the first two buttons

props.docblock: Actions to be performed on the table.

description.text: Actions to be performed on the table.

props.name: numBreakoutFilters
props.docblock: Number between one and four filters that can be shown on the top row.

description.text: Number between one and four filters that can be shown on the top row.

props.name: EmptyTableComponent
props.docblock: Component to be displayed when the table is empty

description.text: Component to be displayed when the table is empty

props.name: children
props.docblock: If children are not provided a table with control bar and footer will be rendered

description.text: If children are not provided a table with control bar and footer will be rendered

props.name: className
props.docblock: class names for the div wrapping the button components

description.text: class names for the div wrapping the button components

props.name: getCellProps
props.docblock: Props for the td element

description.text: Props for the td element

props.name: render
props.docblock: Function that renders the cell contents. Will be called with the string 'Cell'

description.text: Function that renders the cell contents. Will be called with the string 'Cell'

props.docblock: Returns props for the th element

props.docblock: Indicates whether the column is sorted in descending order
